EmailTemplate.subject: You're confirmed!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/how-to-transform-your-business-with-smart-applications]]> Thank you for registering for our upcoming webinar Insights to Action: How to Transform Your Business with Smart Applications on Wednesday, August 17, 2016. Please see event details below:
Date: Wednesday, August 17, 2016 Time: 11:00AM PDT Join the Session
Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers. {{my.Save the Date:default=Save the Date}}
We look forward to you joining us!
The Pivotal Team
